ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:19:34 [Issue ID 4000-595588] urn:comicvine:4000-595588
ComicInfo.Summary:
Now that Ivan has perfected his Witch Positioning System (WPS), the gang take off to sunny Southern California to track down the next witch on their list. Be sure to check out this nightmarish 2nd story arc of DollFace: Tales of the Ball Jointed Witch Hunter!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-------------------------------------------------|-----------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Dan Mendoza | 1 | | B | Tattered & Torn Cover B, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 2 | | C | Pin-Up Cover C, Limited to 1500 | Marco Maccagni | 3 | | D | Pin-Up Tattered & Torn Cover D, Limited to 2000 | Marco Maccagni | 4 | | E | Pin-Up Cover E, Limited to 1500 | Collette Turner | 5 | | F | Pin-Up Tattered & Torn Cover F, Limited to 2000 | Collette Turner | 6 |
Note: The digital edition (5/17/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
